sentence: unlike the banks' more traditional functions, their trading of commodity derivatives has increased in recent years, largely for the same reasons trading activities, in general, have grown: expanded international trade, increased demand for hedging instruments and improved methods for managing and controlling risks, advances in computerization and communications technology, and other factors.

sentence: consequently, following indications of problems in the company's copper trading operations copper prices fell sharply.
